query:
SELECT p.id, c.customer_name,
       JSON_EXTRACT(p.calculations, '$.batteryBrand') as batteryBrand,
       JSON_EXTRACT(p.calculations, '$.batterySizeKwh') as batterySizeKwh,
       p.slide_count
FROM proposals p
JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.id
WHERE p.status = 'generated'
ORDER BY p.id DESC
LIMIT 28
